metadata.name: Ufw Force Stop Using Ufw-Init
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to force stop the ufw using ufw-init

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-ufw-init')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('force-stop')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ufw')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('disable'))))

output.summary: Detects attempts to force stop the ufw using ufw-init

metadata.objective: False positive: Network administrators References: https://blogs.blackberry.com/, https://twitter.com/Joseliyo_Jstnk/status/1620131033474822144
